alert.note: Alert for Coryell; Hamilton; Lampasas; Mills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:44PM CDT until May 04 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in central Texas... West central Coryell County in central Texas... North central Lampasas County in central Texas... East central Mills County in central Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 843 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goldthwaite, or 22 miles north of San Saba, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Goldthwaite, Evant, Mullin, Shive, Moline, Center City, Bee House, Star, Bozar, Pecan Wells and Caradan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
